collection_holder_name: Raynor Memorial Libraries, Department of Special Collections and University Archives
pageContext.collection_description: Contains records of The Breakfast Club, 1933-1968, and Don McNeill's TV Club, 1950-1951, and related personal papers of McNeill. Includes program scripts and outlines, publicity and advertising material, photographs, clippings and scrapbooks, films of Breakfast Club simulcasts, TV Club programs and other television programs featuring McNeill. Also includes sound recordings of several Breakfast Club programs from the 1940s and 1950s and master audiotapes for the last seven months of The Breakfast Club, May-December, 1968.
